days.text: Temperature falling slightly. Mainly cloudy. A few rain patches in the morning. Force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Temperature falling slightly. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 2 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
Mainly fine. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
